title: Changes to Night Network bus
articleContent:
Night Network services

Night Network also includes all-night services on trains, trams and coaches to key regional centres.

Trains run every 60 minutes on all lines, except Stony Point and Flemington Racecourse.

Trams run every 30 minutes on routes 19, 67, 75, 86, 96 and 109.

Coaches depart between 1am and 2.15am from Southern Cross Station to Ballarat, Bendigo, Geelong, Seymour and Traralgon. 

Learn more about our all-night weekend Night Network services.
